headline: Synopsys (SNPS) Slid On Conservative Guidance Despite Solid Results
summary: TimesSquare Capital Management, an equity investment management company, released its “U.S. Mid Cap Growth Strategy” third-quarter investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Within equities, smaller or value-oriented stocks in developed economies yielded higher, whereas emerging markets saw the opposite trend. In the third quarter, the strategy returned 4.96% (gross) and […]

headline: Synopsys offers remedies to address EU concerns over Ansys deal
summary: Chip design software company Synopsys has offered remedies to address EU antitrust concerns about its $35 billion cash-and-stock acquisition of engineering software maker Ansys, according to a European Commission filing on Tuesday.  The deal, announced in January, is the biggest in the technology sector since chipmaker Broadcom's $69 billion swoop on software maker VMware in November 2023.  The EU competition enforcer, which did not disclose details of the proposed remedies in line with its policy, set a Jan. 10 deadline for its decision.
